package.name: Image_JpegXmpReader
package.summary: Read Photoshop-style XMP metadata from JPEG files.
package.description: This package fetches Photoshop-style XMP metadata from JPEG files. Convenience functions are provided to fetch the title, creator, subject and description fields, other fields can be fetched by name, and the parsed XML can be accessed directly. It is a useful tool for accessing JPEGs edited with newer tools that do not provide EXIF metadata and/or provide additional information as XMP.
package.notes: Automatically built QA release Bug #15229 Fatal error for files without XMP data - boutell

release.notes: Automatically built QA release Bug #15229 Fatal error for files without XMP data - boutell
